job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: Role Infra DevOps engineerltbrgtLocation Morrisville NC remote till covidltbrgtMode ContractltbrgtltbrgtDetailed Job descriptionltbrgt	Minimum 5 years as an Infrastructure DevOps or automation engineerltbrgt	Proficient in server side scriptingltbrgt	Knowledge of DevOps capabilities such as Continuous Integration and Delivery CICD Automated Testing etcltbrgt	Knowledge on Terraform is must preferably in Azureltbrgt	Good exposure on Micro services architecture and their deployment in cloud world Especially Azure Terraformltbrgt	Should have worked on setting up amp troubleshooting Kubernetes Clusters in Production ready environmentltbrgt	Help teams in migration from monolithic application to Micro services using containerization solutions Docker Kubernetesltbrgt	Worked on onboarding Micro services MiddlewareUI components using DevOps technique amp look for improvementsltbrgt	Prior experience in automating CICD process platform services using open source toolsltbrgtltbrgtjerrinsmartitframecom
